articles.title: Making some sense of the new ESPN/MLB.TV streaming partnership and what it means to fans
articles.description:
Turns out it's not the simplest deal to parse, and several readers reached out to ask what exactly they have to do to get MLB.TV for the upcoming season.

The post Making some sense of the new ESPN/MLB.TV streaming partnership and what it means to fans appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: ESPN and MLB.TV partner to enhance streaming options for Boston fans.
Fans must subscribe to MLB.TV for access to Red Sox games this season.
Local residents may face confusion over subscription details and access requirements.

articles.title: ‘We’re real excited’: Celtics’ Ron Harper Jr. shares Jayson Tatum looked like himself in recent G League practice
articles.description:
"I'll say that much."

The post ‘We’re real excited’: Celtics’ Ron Harper Jr. shares Jayson Tatum looked like himself in recent G League practice appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics' Ron Harper Jr. reports Jayson Tatum performed well in G League practice.
Tatum's return is crucial for the Celtics as they aim for playoff success.
Boston fans express optimism about Tatum's recovery from his Achilles injury.
